title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Maximizing block storage performance for high-intensity workloads (STG319)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为高强度工作负载最大化块存储性能 (STG319)
abstract: Amazon EBS handles over 140 trillion I/O operations daily. Performance matters, a lot, but it’s not just about average performance—it’s about stable ultra-low latency that minimizes outliers or tail latency. io2 Block Express volumes are designed for that purpose with consistent sub-millisecond latency and 99.999% durability for critical applications such as SAP HANA, Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL, and more. Learn about how its performance characteristics optimize compute utilization, leading to cost efficiency and the success of many performance-demanding use cases. Explore how the expanded support for Multi-Attach NVMe Reservations, Amazon EC2 Nitro instances, and Amazon RDS drives new innovations and architecture enhancements.
abstract_cn: Amazon EBS 每天处理超过 140 万亿次 I/O 操作。性能非常重要，但不仅仅是平均性能——更重要的是稳定的超低延迟，以最大限度地减少异常值或尾部延迟。io2 Block Express 卷专为此目的而设计，具有一致的亚毫秒级延迟和 99.999% 的持久性，适用于 SAP HANA、Oracle、Microsoft SQL Server、MySQL 等关键应用程序。了解其性能特性如何优化计算利用率，从而实现成本效益和许多性能要求苛刻的用例的成功。探索对 Multi-Attach NVMe Reservations、Amazon EC2 Nitro 实例和 Amazon RDS 的扩展支持如何推动新的创新和架构增强。
